metadata.title: CVE-2015-8830 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in the aio_setup_single_vector function in fs/aio.c in theLinux kernel 4.0 allows local users to cause a denial of service orpossibly have unspecified other impact via a large AIO iovec.  NOTE: thisvulnerability exists because of a CVE-2012-6701 regression.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8830` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-86-generic - 3.13.0-86.130
linux-image-3.13.0-86-generic-lpae - 3.13.0-86.130
linux-image-3.13.0-86-lowlatency - 3.13.0-86.130

linux-image-3.13.0-86-powerpc64-smp - 3.13.0-86.130
linux-image-extra-3.13.0-86-generic - 3.13.0-86.130
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.13.0-86.130').
